poncho-menu: Alternative text for the main menu icon.
poncho-languages: Alternative text for the languages menu icon.
poncho-notifications: Alternative text for the notifications menu icon.
poncho-user: Alternative text for the user menu icon.
poncho-more: Label for the button to show more page options.
poncho-enable-dark-mode: Label for the menu option (and preference) that enables the dark mode.
poncho-disable-dark-mode: Label for the menu option that disables the dark mode.
poncho-enable-read-mode: Label for the menu option that enables the read mode.
poncho-disable-read-mode: Label for the menu option (and preference) that disables the read mode.
poncho-no-languages: Notification text when there're no interwiki links for the current page.
poncho-no-notifications: Notification text when the user has no notifications.
poncho-new-message: Notification text when the user receives a new message from another user.
